job_title: System-Level ML Runtime & Driver Engineer (GPU/NPU) – ATG
job_description:
• Strong background in compute system architecture (GPU, NPU).
• Experience with ML frameworks like ONNX/PyTorch and at least one compute stack (ROCm/HIP, CUDA, OpenCL, Metal/Vulkan compute).
• Bachelor’s or Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent AMD Partner Hub Authorized Distributors AMD University Program Design and implement ML runtime components and device drivers for AMD machine learning workloads on GPU/NPU platforms.
• Strong C/C++ (C++17+).
• Concurrency and multithreaded runtime/driver programming.
• Linux/Windows device driver and runtime development for GPU/NPU/DSP.
• Familiarity with HALs and kernel subsystems.
• Solid understanding of both software and hardware design and analysis.

job_title: System Application Engineer – Data Center GPU Platforms
job_description:
• Solid years’ experience in Data Center system design, board design, validation, or Application Engineering, preferably in external customer facing roles.
• Strong knowledge in PC/server architecture and interfaces, experience with system level debug.
• Strong System Level debugging skills with hands-on experiences in system bring-up, HW debug, and performance optimizations on various system architectures.
• Understanding and experience working with Enterprise Linux environment (Ubuntu, CentOS/RHEL and SLES).
• Excellent oral and written communication skills to communicate technical results clearly and accurately.
• Test or design experience in system interconnect technologies (PCIe, XGMI, CXL, USB, I/O Controllers)Familiarity with various deployment models including cloud, virtualization and containers.
• Experience or knowledge of server firmware/BIOS settings, boot process, server monitoring and management SW.
• Experience relating to power and thermal management.

• Your role will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement software applications that meet the needs of our customers.
• You will use your experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
